content: calvin and hobbes is one of my favorite comic strips of all time so i thought it would be wonderful to finally release the calvin amigurumi doll as a free crochet pattern he s made with an open mouth construction that i think is just perfect for his mischievous and adventurous spirit his appearance includes his striped red and black tee black shorts red sneakers a cute button nose big ears and of course his spiky blonde hair his size is about 12 inch tall 30 cm tall i also have a free pattern for hobbes amigurumi 1 so make sure to crochet him as well they are the perfect duo to go exploring with also be sure to check out the rest of my open mouth amigurumi series 2 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i d love to see how your project turns out tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 3 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level ** intermediate **need to know ** single_crochet in the round single_crochet in row half_double_crochet double_crochet chain stitch how to increase and decrease 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/hobbes-amigurumi---cuddly-tiger 2 https //www ravelry com/bundles/open-mouth-amigurumi-series 3 https //www instagram com/ami_amour
